alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 7:57PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS EXPECTED THIS EVENING... Scattered heavy snow showers dropping southeast from northwest Wisconsin and Upper Michigan will shift across north-central and portions of far northeast Wisconsin this evening. The brief bursts of snow with the heavy snow showers will result in a significant reduction in visibility--possibly to less than 1/4 mile at times-- and pose a hazard to anyone traveling across the area this evening. Otherwise, periods of light snow will continue across the area this evening. Gusty west winds will also produce some blowing and drifting of the snow that has already fallen. Temperatures well below freezing will result in untreated roads remaining snow covered and slippery. Anyone traveling this evening should be prepared for the possibility of encountering heavy snow showers with greatly reduced visibility. Use extra caution, and allow extra time to reach your destination.
